business.headline: Tesla shares tumble nearly 9%, market value dips below $1 trillion. Here's whyTesla share price: The decline followed data from the European Automobile Manufacturers Association, which reported Tesla's sales in Europe fell 45% in January.

Tata Motors shares down 44% from 52-week high. Should you buy the dip?Tata Motors shares: In the previous trading session, the stock closed lower 1.2% lower at Rs 660.30. So far this year, it's lost over 11%. In six months, it's down 40%. Over a year, it's fallen 30%.

RBI eases lending rules for small borrowers and NBFCs. Here's what it meansThe RBI has also put on hold its earlier proposals to increase the capital that banks must set aside for new project loans and the liquidity they need to maintain for digital deposits.

New India Co-op Bank vault had 12 times its capacity on paper: Report The Mumbai Police's Economic Offences Wing (EOW) is probing an alleged Rs 122-crore embezzlement at the bank and has arrested three people so far, including two former senior executives of the lender.

Infosys employees get 5-8% salary hikes, lower than before: ReportThe IT firm sent salary revision letters to employees, offering hikes between 5% and 8% for most, depending on their performance rating.
Failed to deposit TDS? Tax officials may be knocking soonAround 40,000 taxpayers are under scrutiny for potential defaults in tax deductions for the financial years 2022-23 and 2023-24.

Applying for personal loan? 5 hidden charges you must check While banks may not disclose the hidden charges when applying for personal loans, borrowers must understand them when applying for the same.
FD rates dip: Check IndusInd, DCB, City Union and other top banksWith a drop in FD interest rates, depositors might witness a marginal decline in their earnings on fixed deposits.

Chairman says allegations are false: Jubilant FoodWorks after reports of FIRIn a stock exchange filing, Jubilant FoodWorks said its Chairman Shyam Sundar Bhartia has denied all allegations against him, calling them "baseless, false and disparaging, and made with clear malafide intent".

Sensex gains, Nifty loses: Markets stay range-bound as cautious sentiment prevailsThe S&P BSE Sensex gained 147.71 points to close at 74,602.12, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 5.80 points to end at 22,547.55.

RBI withdrawal relief for New India Co-op Bank depositors. Check details hereThis announcement comes just over a week after the central bank prohibited the bank from issuing new loans, dissolved its board and took control owing to 'supervisory concerns.'

Sell India, Buy China: Why FIIs are falling out of love with Dalal StreetDalal Street has witnessed correction over the past six months, with the Nifty50 plummeting from 25,200 levels to around 22,500 levels by the end of February 2025.

entertainment.headline: Tanmay Bhat jokes about Ranveer Allahbadia ignoring his textsTanmay Bhat hilariously addressed the India's Got Latent controversy, joking about Ranveer Allahbadia ignoring his texts. The reaction video left fellow comedians laughing and also "triggered" them.

Singer Udit Narayan visits Maha Kumbh Mela with wife, expresses gratitude Singer Udit Narayan was among the latest celebrities to visit the holy city of Prayagraj for Maha Kumbh 2025. In an interview with ANI, he expressed his gratitude and congratulated Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath for the well-organised and efficient arrangements.

My Dearest Nemesis review: Chaotic chemistry makes even familiar trope workMy Dearest Nemesis features K-drama stars Moon Ga young and Choi Hyun-wook in the lead. It is available to stream on Viki. Here's our take on the romantic drama.

Internet calls Farah Khan 'insensitive' for mocking Gaurav Khanna's colour blindnessCelebrity MasterChef judge Farah Khan mocked TV actor Gaurav Khanna's colour blindness on the show. Following the same, the internet is outraged by her comments, criticising the filmmaker and calling her 'insensitive'.

Parineeti Chopra gears up for her first Netflix yet-to-be-titled thriller seriesActor Parineeti Chopra is set to make her series OTT debut with a Netflix project. The actor shared a post and informed about sharing screen space with Nimrit Kaur, Soni Razdan, and others.

Tanmay Bhat's X account hacked, comedian warns followersTanmay Bhat's X account recently got hacked, leading to fraudulent messages being posted online. The comedian shared a post on his Instagram and warned his followers.

Prajakta Koli-Vrishank Khanal can't take their eyes off each other in haldi picsActor Prajakta Koli is set to marry longtime boyfriend Vrishank Khanan on February 25. Ahead of the grand day, the actor shared pictures from her haldi function.

Anupam Mittal on India's Got Latent backlash: Not a lost episode of Satyamev JayateAnupam Mittal weighs in on the India's Got Latent row, arguing that YouTube should also be held accountable. He calls Big Tech the real culprit, criticising digital platforms for fueling outrage-driven content.

Bobby Deol says Aashram helped him break industry image, explore new rolesActor Bobby Deol is all set to return as Baba Nirala in Prakash Jha's series, Aashram 3 part 2. The actor confessed that he wanted to step out of his comfort zone.

Waking of Nation trailer: Taaruk Raina fights to prove Jallianwala Bagh was plannedA new show that explores the events surrounding the Jallianwala Bagh massacre is set to premiere on Sony LIV on March 8. Starring Taaruk Raina in the lead role, the series is titled The Waking of a Nation.
Singer Justin Bieber responds to rumours of drug useJustin Bieber's representative has reacted to the reports of the singer's drug use and called them false.

Ranveer Allahbadia runs to car after recording statement in Latent probeRanveer Allahbadia was clicked in a hurried state, running towards his car as the paparazzi tried to capture his pictures on Monday. The YouTuber visited the Maharashtra Cyber office in Mahape after recording his statement.

Kaushaljis vs Kaushal review: A simple yet complex tale of second chance in loveReleased-Fri Feb 21, 2025Kaushaljis vs Kaushal movie review: This film is a heartfelt exploration of second chances in love, focusing on a middle-aged couple navigating the complexities of separation and familial expectations. Set in the relatable backdrop of Kannauj, the film captivates with its simplicity and stellar performances.

Dupahiya trailer: A wedding, a missing bike and a lot of chaos in offingThe first full trailer of Prime Video's upcoming comedy series, Dupahiya, is here. The show will feature actors such as Sparsh Shrivastava and Gajraj Rao in pivotal roles.

Bride-to-Be Prajakta Koli dances to Zingaat with fiance at mehndi ceremony. WatchPrajakta Koli shared glimpses of her mehndi ceremony as she danced joyfully with fiance Vrishank Khanal. The couple is set to marry on February 25.

Zero Day review: Star power can't save this weakly executed political dramaReleased-Thu Feb 20, 2025Zero Day, directed by Lesli Linka Glatter, is a political drama featuring a stellar cast including Robert De Niro and Angela Bassett. While the performances are strong, the series struggles with plot depth and resolution.

Watch: Jennie and Doechii bring the heat with ExtraL ahead of RubyJennie and Doechii are making waves with their latest collaboration, ExtraL. As Jennie gears up for her solo debut with the album Ruby, fans can expect a bold new chapter in her musical journey.

Complaint against Munawar Faruqui for 'insulting religion' on Hafta Vasooli showComedian Munawar Faruqui landed in legal trouble after a complaint was filed against him for hurting religious sentiments through his show, Hafta Vasooli. The advocate shared a copy of the complaint on X.

'Mismatched' actor Prajakta Koli shares dreamy pics from her mehndiContent creator and actor Prajakta Koli has started her pre-wedding celebrations with a vibrant mehndi ceremony. She shared joyful moments with her fiance Vrishank Khanal and family on social media.

Honey Singh's Millionaire concert in Mumbai showed what grand comebacks look likeYo Yo Honey Singh made a powerful return to the stage in Mumbai, captivating fans with his energy and heartfelt messages. His performance was a testament to his resilience and dedication to the art.

Samay Raina recalls what he asked Tanmay Bhat after India's Got Latent controversyComedian Samay Raina addresses the controversy surrounding YouTuber Ranveer Allahbadia's inappropriate remark on his show, India's Got Latent, during his tour in Canada. He recalled what he had asked Tanmay Bhat after the controversy erupted.
Honey Singh's jibe at Raftaar, Badshah: People say they'll write my destinyHoney Singh took a direct dig at fellow artists Badshah and Raftaar at the first Millionaire India Tour stop in Mumbai.

Watch: Honey Singh's take on Diljit Dosanjh's 'Punjabi Aa Gaya Oye'Honey Singh launched his Millionaire India Tour in Mumbai, delivering a captivating performance that engaged a sold-out audience. He shared his take on Diljit Dosanjh's 'Punjabi aa gays oye', emphasising unity among diverse Indian communities.

Watch: Honey Singh kicks off Millionaire tour with a grand Mumbai showRapper Honey Singh launched his Millionaire Tour with a spectacular concert in Mumbai. The show featured dramatic entrances and a lineup of energetic performances.

Undercover High School X review: Fans give thumbs up to Seo Kang-joon's K-dramaUndercover High School, featuring Seo Kang-joon and Jin Ki-joo, has premiered on MBC TV. The series, praised for its engaging storyline, follows an undercover NIS agent as a high school student.

Rapper Diddy's attorney withdraws from case: Under no circumstances can I continueAnthony Ricco, representing Sean 'Diddy' Combs, has filed to withdraw from the federal case citing reasons protected by attorney-client privilege. Ricco had once defended Osama bin Laden.

Buried Hearts review: Park Hyung-sik commands attention in his darkest roleReleased-Sat Feb 22, 2025The Korean drama Buried Hearts will captivate viewers with its blend of intense emotions and high-stakes drama. The series, featuring Park Hyung-sik, explores the complex dynamics of corporate intrigue and personal survival. Read the full review.

Rakhi Sawant reacts to summons: I'm poor, not criminal - focus on rape casesRakhi Sawant was summoned by the Maharashtra cyber cell to record her statement regarding YouTuber Ranveer Allahbadia's controversial remarks on Samay Raina's show, 'India's Got Latent'. She urged the police to focus on solving pending rape cases instead of treating her like a criminal.

Zero Day: Critics praise Robert De Niro, criticise show's 'incoherent politics'Critics have mixed reactions to Robert De Niro's latest Netflix series, Zero Day. While many have praised De Niro, a section of them are unhappy with the narrative of the show.

Grammy-nominated band OneRepublic unites with Karan Aujla for new song Tell MeGlobal pop-rock sensation OneRepublic is collaborating with Punjabi artist Karan Aujla for a new track titled Tell Me. It will release on February 27.

Mismatched actor Prajakta Koli to marry boyfriend on February 25: ReportActor Prajakta Koli is set to marry her boyfriend Vrishank Khanal on February 25. Their wedding festivities will begin on February 23.

Crime Beat review: Rahul Bhat, Saqib Saleem's crime drama gets lost in its own chaosReleased-Fri Feb 21, 2025'Crime Beat', a political thriller, premiered on Zee5 on February 21. Based on the book titled 'The Price You Pay', the show falls short due to outdated tropes and exaggerated clichés.

Honey Singh says he's a great cook, reveals his favourite dishRapper and music producer Yo Yo Honey Singh opens up about his favourite cuisine, his cooking skills and more in an exclusive interaction with us.

From heartfelt to hilarious, in praise of Park Bo-young's versatilityKorean star Park Bo-young has been acting for almost two decades now. Her ability to completely inhabit the skin of her characters makes her truly stand out. She is currently seen in Melo Movie, which is streaming on Netflix.

Honey Singh on his Mumbai concert: Doing something I've never done beforeRapper Honey Singh is starting his countrywide tour from Mumbai on Saturday. In an exclusive interview with us, the singer talked about the gig and what he's doing differently this time at 'Millionaire India Tour at Stage Aajtak'.

Kangana Ranaut's Emergency to premiere on Netflix. Check release dateKangana Ranaut's film, Emergency, is going to hit the screens next month. The actor shared a quick announcement in her Instagram stories on Friday.

Robin Tunney marks 10 years since The Mentalist finale, thanks fan for their loveActor Robin Tunney celebrated the 10th anniversary of The Mentalist finale, expressing gratitude to fans for their unwavering support. She also reflected on the show's impact on her life and career.

Atif Aslam's surprise street performance in London leaves fans in disbelief. WatchSinger Atif Aslam's video of him performing on a London street has emerged online. This surprise clip has left many fans in disbelief.

Honey Singh Millionaire tour: Reasons why it's unlike any otherYo Yo Honey Singh is set to electrify Mumbai with his high-energy performance as part of the Stage Tak Millionaire tour, promising an unforgettable night of music and nostalgia. Here are a few reasons why one should not miss it.

Nobody Wants This 2: What is Leighton Meester playing in husband Adam Brody's show?Netflix renewed 'Nobody Wants This' for season 2 last year, and now actor Leighton Meester, known for playing Blair Waldorf in 'Gossip Girl', has joined the show. Her husband, actor Adam Brody, plays the lead character, Noah, in the series.

general news.headline: Buzz over Arvind Kejriwal's Rajya Sabha entry after AAP's bypoll moveThe buzz over AAP chief Arvind Kejriwal's Rajya Sabha entry intensified after the party fielded MP Sanjeev Arora in the Ludhiana West Assembly bypoll.

Vijay, Prashant Kishor step out together, set stage for party's 2026 battle  At TVK's first-anniversary event, actor-politician Vijay sharpened his attack on the DMK and the BJP. In line with the #GetOutModi and #GetOutStalin trend, Vijay and party leaders signed a #GetOut board. Furthering speculations about his political plans, Vijay shared the stage with election strategist Prashant Kishor.

Maha Kumbh marks grand culmination today, devotees flock for final Amrit SnanThe Maha Kumbh Mela in Prayagraj, which attracted 65 crore devotees from across the country, is set to conclude on Wednesday, coinciding with Mahashivratri.

What is Trump's Gold Card for immigrants, $5 million 'pathway to US citizenship'?US President Donald Trump has introduced the 'Gold Card', a $5 million pathway to US citizenship for wealthy foreign investors, calling it a "premium" Green Card.

If not Congress, the options that Shashi Tharoor hasWith his future in the Congress unclear, four-time MP Shashi Tharoor finds himself at a crossroads. He's welcomed by the Left, courted by the BJP, and experts speculate he could even launch his own political outfit. Will he carve a new path or join the BJP or remain adrift in the Congress? This is what Tharoor and political experts have to say.

Imran Khan warns of Pakistan cricket's death as blame game over flop show beginsImran Khan expressed disappointment over Pakistan's Champions Trophy exit, blaming poor leadership in cricket administration, while former PCB chief Najam Sethi held Imran responsible for the sport's decline due to his overhaul of the domestic structure. The turmoil in Pakistan cricket continues, with head coach Aaqib Javed reportedly set to be sacked.

Bihar Cabinet expansion today at 4 pm, 5 BJP MLAs may join: SourcesThe current strength of the Bihar Cabinet is 30, with 15 BJP ministers, 13 JD(U), one from the Hindustani Awam Morcha (HAM) and an Independent. Six seats remain vacant.

Over 100 Pakistani policemen dismissed for refusing Champions Trophy dutyIn an unprecedented move, over 100 Punjab Police officers were dismissed for refusing security duties during the ICC Champions Trophy 2025, as authorities emphasised zero tolerance for negligence in safeguarding international sporting events.

Why Thailand's Koh Samui is gaining popularity among IndiansKoh Samui is known for its beautiful beaches, temples like Wat Phra Yai (Big Buddha Temple), and natural attractions such as Hin Ta and Hin Yai Rocks.

Army guns down Pakistani intruder, foils infiltration bid in Punjab's PathankotAlert BSF troops foiled an infiltration attempt in Pathankot on February 26. Officials said personnel at BOP Tashpatan detected suspicious movement and spotted an intruder trying to cross into India.

England greats accuse ICC of favouritism: India playing in Dubai an 'advantage'Former England cricketers Nasser Hussain and Michael Atherton believe India has a major advantage in the Champions Trophy by playing all their matches in Dubai, avoiding travel fatigue while other teams shuttle between Pakistan and the UAE.

Not Elon Musk, but Amy Gleason is heading Trump's DOGE. Who is she?After weeks of speculation, the White House on Tuesday named Amy Gleason as acting administrator of the Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE). Court filings revealed that, despite Trump's claims, Elon Musk has no direct authority over the cost-cutting program.

Govinda reacts to divorce rumours with Sunita, prefers talking 'business'Rumours have been rife about Govinda and Sunita Ahuja heading for divorce 37 years after their marriage. The actor now reacted to the reports and chose to rather talk about work.

Ranveer Allahbadia's statement to cops over 'sex with parents' joke: Made mistakeRanveer Allahbadia is under investigation by Maharashtra Cyber and Mumbai police for comments made on comedian Samay Raina's show India's Got Latent.

Video: US flight aborts landing at last minute to avoid collision with jetThe quick response by the pilots of a Southwest Airlines flight avoided a catastrophic collision at Chicago Midway International Airport, when an unauthorised business jet entered the runway.

Amid boycott call shadow, Jos Buttler speaks on women's plight under TalibanEngland captain Jos Buttler backed the ECB's decision to play Afghanistan in the Champions Trophy despite boycott calls, expressing concern for Afghan women but hoping sport can unite. Afghanistan captain Hashmatullah Shahidi distanced cricket from politics, while the Taliban's restrictions on women's sport remain under scrutiny.

Preity Zinta reflects on life and attachment after third Maha Kumbh visitPreity Zinta visited Maha Kumbh with her mother and reflected on life, attachment, and spirituality. This was her third visit to Maha Kumbh Mela which is set to conclude later today.

Conman Sukesh writes to 'my man' Elon Musk, offers to invest $2 billion in XJailed conman Sukesh Chandrashekar has written to Elon Musk, calling him "my man" and offering to invest $2 billion in X. From Delhi's Mandoli jail, he also congratulated Musk on leading the US government's new Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE).

US, Ukraine agree to critical minerals deal amid talks to end Russia warThe US and Ukraine have finalised a minerals deal, hoping to improve ties, as Kyiv agreed to joint resource development after the US reportedly dropped its $500 billion revenue demand.

Watch: Virat Kohli fans in Pakistan root for India after home team's exit Champions Trophy: A section of Pakistan cricket fans, speaking to India Today in Lahore, said they were rooting for India to win the tournament. The Men in Blue beat Pakistan by six wickets in their second Group A fixture, which put them on the verge of being knocked out. They faced the exit after New Zealand's commanding win over Bangladesh.

Thalapathy Vijay's son Jason Sanjay makes rare public appearance at weddingActor-politician Thalapathy Vijay's son, Jason Sanjay, attended PMK's (Pattali Makkal Katchi) honorary president GK Mani's grandson's wedding reception. This rare public appearance comes ahead of his directorial debut.

Rahul Bose was denied a chair on set: Producer's uncle, sister had one, but not meActor Rahul Bose recalls being denied a chair on his first film set, while everyone else had one. The experience led him to always bring his own chair to sets. He will next be seen in Metro... In Dino.

Shivratri every month, Maha Shivratri once a year – know whyShivratri is observed every month on the 14th lunar day, dedicated to Lord Shiva, while Maha Shivratri, celebrated once a year, holds special significance as it marks the divine union of Lord Shiva and Goddess Parvati. Here's a detailed explanation of both these auspicious occasions.

Prabhas puts Kalki 2, Salaar 2 on hold for new film with Prasanth Varma: ReportActor Prabhas has got a stunning pipeline of movies. He now seems to have made a new addition to the list with a film by 'Jai Hanuman' director, Prasanth Varma.

Dragon OTT release: When and where to watch Pradeep Ranganathan's filmPradeep Ranganathan, Anupama Paramesawaran and Kayadu Lohar's Dragon is running successfully in theatres. The film is likely to be available for streaming a month after its release.

Here are five reasons why Officer On Duty is an example of how a template cop-thriller can be successful if the packaging is right.

Security breach disrupts Champions Trophy in PakistanA security breach at Pakistan's Champions Trophy involved an intruder approaching cricketer Rachin Ravindra. The intruder, linked to an Islamist political group, has been banned by the Cricket Board.

Steve Smith, Rashid Khan to star in The Hundred, Ben Stokes pulls outSteve Smith and Rashid Khan secured The Hundred deals, while England's Ben Stokes opted out to manage his workload. The tournament also saw major signings, including Trent Boult, Marcus Stoinis, Meg Lanning, and Laura Wolvaardt.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
